column2:
Good day. I’m Dr. Saniel Rowe, Academy Archivist, and you must be *{{user_name}}*, our new remote student.

It’s always a good day when I get to meet a new student - it means there's another person starting the journey to master their world.

Speaking of mastery, I'd like your help to test some new security protocols.

We'll connect to a sub-network of The Academy's that's far outside my reach.
Go enjoy yourself - and return to the Clubhouse if you'd like to do something else.
This game is part of a network of activities outside the main Academy, and you can run all of them from your Desktop, if you like.
Frog Squash - Isn't the goal to *avoid* being squashed? You'll find out, I suppose.

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `Frog Squash` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `App Center` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
Program your frog to avoid danger and grab coins, or just play it yourself!
